description:
Itsuka appears before Asuta with orders from Venera.  His instinct is to run away, but after Itsuka learns that he is starving, he`s invited over for dinner.  However, the food he`s served at Zvezda base is not what you would call food.  Meanwhile, White Robin and Egret are ordered by their commander to investigate Zvezda.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: De la table à la tombe
From the Dining Table to the Grave
